body_html:
I took a look here.
It is difficult to use docstrings + sphinx here for the properties using the ContextProp class - I haven't found a way trying docstrings in various forms and suggestions I found. My impression is that with the module replacement trick, ContextProp could be replaced by regular properties (I tried and it seemed to work), would that be OK, @ezyang ?

I took a look here.
It is difficult to use docstrings + sphinx here for the properties using the ContextProp class - I haven't found a way trying docstrings in various forms and suggestions I found.
